hypothesis_content.title: DeFi Token Liquidity Recovery After Stress Events
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a market stress event (BTC drawdown >8% in 3 days), DeFi tokens (CRV, GRT, AVAX) experience disproportionate selling. When BTC stabilizes (2 consecutive green days), these tokens rebound 1.8-2.2x more than BTC over the next 5 days as liquidity returns to undervalued sectors.
hypothesis_content.rationale: DeFi tokens experience amplified selling during stress due to leverage unwinding. When panic subsides, they rebound faster as liquidity seeks oversold assets with strong fundamentals.
entry_conditions: BTC drawdown >8% from recent high within 3 days
CRV/GRT/AVAX underperform BTC by >15% during drawdown
BTC shows 2 consecutive green daily closes post-drawdown

exit_conditions.take_profit: Position reaches 2x BTC return over same period
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Token underperforms BTC by 5% after entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: DeFi tokens continue underperforming BTC despite market stabilization and meeting oversold criteria.
